channel.title: Ultimate Weekly Jam
channel.description:
Welcome to our Podcast Page
Please listen without prejudice. I’m a night club DJ that also DJ’s weddings and other functions. I will only play this at your event should you request it. This more catered towards my nightclub clientele and fans of my work in the night club scene.

Every week we will be bringing you a podcast showcasing the best in all genres of music. DJ REDEYEZ will be rocking the ones and twos for all of you and will also feature special guest DJ’s and bands as time goes by. We hope you enjoy our show. Don’t forget to subscribe and pass the link to all your friends who appreciate good music.

item.title: Latin Mafia on 4by4
item.description:
WOW, where to start??? Ok so here is the update... I’ve moved my Monday shows on www.radio4by4.com to Thursdays from 4 pm till 6 pm EST. I’ve joined the Latin Mafia Sessions!!! Here is my first show I did on the 31st of May.
If you like what you hear... don’t be shy... follow me on twitter @dj_redeyez
or.... Find me on Facebook
www.facebook.com/officialdjredeyezpage

Hope you guys are enjoying these sets and please let your friends know where it’s at!!!

For bookings
705 727 6602

item.title: 3 a.m. Trance
item.description:
I was sitting in my studio thinking.... and I realized that I had not done a Trance show is some time now... I opened my laptop, loaded my decks.... and went to town.
Big things are coming down the pipe for Redeyez now... This Thurs. I will be @ The Mansion in Barrie, then to London, then back to Barrie to Fitzy’s.
I’m so glad and thankful that my wife is as supportive as she is, she is the real reason I’m here. She supports me and pushes me every day to be better at what I do. Thank you Trish.
Mr. Product.... it’s time, read your arm and lets do it. The Caretakerz are here and we are gonna clean up this scene.

Hope you guys enjoy this week’s show.

See ya next week!!!

Make sure you follow me @dj_redeyez

Please visit me on Facebook and ‘Like’ my page to keep up to date with all the dates and locations of where I’ll be playing.
http://www.facebook.com/officialdjredeyezpage

item.title: Vinyl Fetish
item.description:
Wicked set this week... I got into some ol vinyl as promised and am happy with what I pulled out of the box. Maybe once a month I will do these vinyl sets.
This Friday coming up we have a party worth coming out to in Toronto, we are pulling DR. Trance out of retirement, and bringing in the heavy artillery for our Reunion Rave that is being held at Nocturne @ 550 Queens Street West on Friday May 11, 2012. We have alot of big names like Grimace, Dominik, Flex to name a few.... I would make it your business to be there for this chance of a life time party.

So as I mentioned this is a vinyl set, no laptops, no MP3’s, no if ands or butts, just good music via 2 1200’s and a mixer. The way it used to be. I was a little rusty... but got the job done. Hope you enjoy and we’ll see you next week!!!

Make sure you follow me @dj_redeyez

Please visit me on Facebook and ‘Like’ my page to keep up to date with all the dates and locations of where I’ll be playing.
http://www.facebook.com/officialdjredeyezpage

item.title: Wowzers!!!
item.description:
We are back on track now!!! Here is my show recorded from www.radio4by4.com 2012 seems to be bringing out some incredible tracks so far and can’t wait to hear whats coming down the pipe. House music has come such a long way and it just keeps evolving into something greater and greater. Always moving forward, and on that note I’d like to let you know I too am moving forward.
Next weeks show is gonna be a cool show, we are going to put together a full vinyl show, no laptops, no mp3’s, no wavs. Just Vinyl so make sure you tune in.
I am a huge believer in change, without it we would all still be cave people! lol So here is to change, let us all change for the better. Don’t let people hold you back from what you want to do. If there is something you want... go get it, set your goals and achieve them. Clint, I’m talking to you. Now lets do this.

Enjoy and make sure you follow me @dj_redeyez

Please visit me on Facebook and ‘Like’ my page to keep up to date with all the dates and locations of where I’ll be playing.
http://www.facebook.com/officialdjredeyezpage

item.title: Four Beats Squared
item.description:
A lot of things on the go right now... been spinning everywhere... This is a copy of my show today on www.radio4by4.com, we went through a lot of types of house on this one. We touched some deep, some funky, some hard.... some everything!!!
We have moved fusion to the Queens Hotel in Barrie for a bit till we find a new home, but if you like House music you should check us out now on Thursdays there.

Please visit me on Facebook and ‘Like’ my page to keep up to date with all the dates and locations of where I’ll be playing.
http://www.facebook.com/officialdjredeyezpage

Don’t be shy follow me @dj_redeyez

See ya on the dance floor!

item.title: Buckle Up!!!
item.description:
I’m super excited, life has handed me some interesting options. Here is a set I threw together the other day. I am busy now days keeping Fusion going strong, we have had some great shows so far and we intend on keeping them going strong. My boy DJ Remibon does an incredible job at setting the pace for the evening, while LeRouge takes us to a whole new level. I usually close the night and keep us partying till close. If you have not had a chance to experience Fusion in Barrie, On. I strongly suggest you do. We are Barrie’s first and only pure Electronica club bringing you the best in Tech, House, Trance, and Dubstep.

Please visit me on Facebook and ‘Like’ my page to keep up to date with all the dates and locations of where I’ll be playing.
http://www.facebook.com/officialdjredeyezpage

Also check out our Fusion wall and ‘Like’ that for your chance to win some prizes.
http://www.facebook.com/FusionFriday

Thanks for tuning in and we’ll see you next week!!!

item.title: This is Dubstep
item.description:
This weeks episode is a Dubstep set!!! I did this set a couple of weeks ago and I’ve let out little samples of it here and there, but here it is. Fusion Fridays are going strong and I hope to see you guys there one Friday night. This club has taken Barrie by storm, a whole new set of faces that refused to get Top 40’d at. I so happy and proud to be part of such a revolutionary and integral part of the clubbing community in Barrie.

Please visit me on Facebook and ‘Like’ my page to keep up to date with all the dates and locations of where I’ll be playing.
http://www.facebook.com/officialdjredeyezpage

Also check out our Fusion wall and ‘Like’ that for your chance to win some prizes.
http://www.facebook.com/FusionFriday

Thanks for tuning in and we’ll see you next week!!!

item.title: We are the future
item.description:
Once again I’m back... I hope you have been enjoying these podcasts. There are a lot of people I’d like to thank for making these all possible, but the most important one is YOU. Without you there really is no reason to produce or take the time to put these together, so with that... Thank you.
We are now going into week two of Fusion, and last weeks Grand Opening was a huge success. I’m proud to be part of a team like Nemesis... Here is to the future.
This week we are holding our White Sensation party and again it should be off the hook.
Another set of people I would like to thank is www.radio4by4.com Drake you and the crew have worked so hard to get to year three and you guys deserve all the best for all your efforts. I really am honoured to be one of your resident DJ’s as well. Can’t wait to throw down in Miami with the rest of you in March for WMC.
Please follow all of us for the best in Electronic music
@radio4by4
@Fusion_Fridays
@dj_redeyez
http://www.facebook.com/FusionFriday
http://www.facebook.com/officialdjredeyezpage

Thank you all again and welcome to the future.

item.title: Fusion
item.description:
This week is a great week! We are finally opening our doors to the public @ Fusion Fridays. We are all extremely happy and excited to bring you all such a venue. It’s taken some serious effort and I’d like to thank all those responsible helping make this happen. Big thanks to Nemesis for taking me as a resident DJ. Another big thanks to Shane for doing what you do and have done... We are light years ahead of the game now. I invite you all to come visit our new house located at 50 Dunlop St. W in Barrie Ontario. We are only open Fridays from 11 pm till 3 am EST. Bring you ID and forget your attitude because this club is all about P.L.U.R.
NO FU*&ING TOP 40!!! Time to stop the insanity.
See you on the dance floor!!!

http://www.facebook.com/pages/Fusion/332049143481089

also feel free to ‘Like’ my page:

http://www.facebook.com/officialdjredeyezpage

item.title: Transient Movements
item.description:
Todays show is a Trance set, it’s been a while since I threw one of these down. I’ve now joined a crew called “Nemesis” and we will be opening our club called Fusion Fridays on the 27th of January. We are all very excited as this will be Barrie’s first and only Electronic club dedicated to Electronica. NO TOP 40!!! We will be concentrating on House, Dubstep, and Trance.
If you are interested in finding out more about this club visit our facebook page:

http://www.facebook.com/pages/Fusion/332049143481089

also feel free to ‘Like’ my page:

http://www.facebook.com/officialdjredeyezpage

item.title: Put your hands up!!!!
item.description:
Ok kids, so here is the first podcast of the year! I’m loving it so far... 2012 is going to be huge. There is a new club opening up in Barrie called Fusion, it will be unlike any other club in Barrie. Fusion will be the first full electronic music night club in Barrie... that’s right.. NO TOP 40!!! WOOOOOOOO!!!! Now we are talking. I will be the resident DJ at this club and we are going to take you to the next level... Get ready Barrie....

Be sure to ‘Like’ my fan page :

http://www.facebook.com/officialdjredeyezpage

Also check out the Fusion page:

http://www.facebook.com/pages/Fusion/332049143481089

item.title: It’s time...
item.description:
It’s time... that’s right. Time to stop procrastinating, time to stop the negativity, time to move forward, time to forgive, time to love, time to unite, time to be better people, it’s time we start believing in each other, start helping each other. This set is dedicated to mankind, I hope everyone strives to be a better person today than they were yesterday. I guess that is my Christmas wish, for all of us to improve in one way or another. Enjoy & feel free to leave a comment!!!
Be sure to find me on facebook and like my page for all the latest news on where and when I’ll be playing somewhere.
http://www.facebook.com/officialdjredeyezpage
or follow me @dj_redeyez on Twitter

item.title: Lets talk Techno
item.description:
So todays show was all Techno with some Tribal hints. I never know what kind of show I’m gonna do till it’s time to do it. This morning I woke up and decided to do something darker and harder so I went into my techno folders to see what I could pull out... Here it is.
I hope you all enjoy this one, and if you have any comments please do not hesitate to contact me via facebook
www.facebook.com//officialdjredeyezpage

item.title: Marching Forward
item.description:
Here is Monday’s show from www.radio4by4.com
I’ve now joined forces with a station based out of Ottawa called www.freshbeats.ca on occasion I will be a guest DJ and you will hear my sets on the FM dial!!! Join my facebook page to find out when and where I will be playing next!!!
www.facebook.com/officialdjredeyezpage

Thank you all for tuning in and subscribing.

item.title: Awake
item.description:
The time was 4am when I got the urge to go to the studio.
Once in my room, I looked at my laptop and pressed the power button, looked down at my CDJ’s and mixer... they both seem to know what was about to happen. I looked out the window and all was calm outside. The night had no clue what was about to happen. When I came to... this is all that was left....

Enjoy.
Follow me on Twitter @dj_redeyez

item.title: House Music for your Soul
item.description:
I hope you all enjoy this nice change of pace... I decided that I needed to put together a set like this, nice and deep. I performed this one live on
www.livestream.com/barrieshousenetwork This is a new station based out of Barrie Ontario, you will be able to see the club scene in barrie. It’s just starting up so give it time...

Thanks for listening
Keep the Weekend Alive!

RedEyez

It’s just starting up so give it time... Thanks for listening Keep the Weekend Alive! RedEyez

item.title: Let’s make it happen
item.description: So last Friday night I did a jam with two legends in the industry, Robb G and Deko-ze and some other great DJ’s. I could not believe the turn out at this show... There were tons of people there. I wanted to know where they all came from cause in the small town I live in, people just seem to love Top40. Now that I’ve seen all these people, I want to start a proper House night up in Barrie... Who is in?
item.itunes:subtitle: So last Friday night I did a jam with two legends in the industry, Robb G and Deko-ze and some other great DJ’s. I could not believe the turn out at this show... There were tons of people there. I wanted to know where they all came from cause in
item.itunes:summary: So last Friday night I did a jam with two legends in the industry, Robb G and Deko-ze and some other great DJ’s. I could not believe the turn out at this show... There were tons of people there. I wanted to know where they all came from cause in the small town I live in, people just seem to love Top40. Now that I’ve seen all these people, I want to start a proper House night up in Barrie... Who is in?

item.title: I Love House Music!!!
item.description:
I find life has so many things to offer, what are the things you love in life? I love my wife, I love my kids, I love my family, and I love House Music! I got hooked on House Music when I was about 14. I somehow ended up at an all ages night at a nightclub in Toronto called Club Focus located behind City Hall. I remember the pounding bass lines rushing through my body, looking around and seeing people with their eyes closed and in a trance like state of mind, feeling every molecule in your body move in sync with the music. I have listened to all different styles of music since and nothing can compare, well... let me rephrase that, nothing can make me feel like House Music does. It is now part of my soul, it is infused in my blood, it is me, and I am House Music.
I did this show yesterday on www.radio4by4.com and I wanted to post it as soon as I could. Hope you all enjoy it!!!
See you soon!

item.title: RedEyez on the decks again
item.description:
Ok... so I’ve been slacking on getting these up, but here you go!!! This is a quick little set I did a couple weeks ago. If you like what you hear check out my live to air show Mondays from 10 am - 12 pm EST on www.radio4by4.com
You can also join my fan page on www.facebook.com/officialdjredeyezpage to see where and when I’m playing where.

See Ya Soon!!!
Keep the weekend alive!!!

item.title: House for Dinner...
item.description:
So it took me a little time to get this one posted... sorry, but at least it’s here!!! We start of in a soulful kinda way then slowly pick it up and once again in my fashion... end up in the classics.... Hope you enjoy...
Be sure to follow me on Twitter @dj_redeyez

item.title: The Party Continues
item.description: So.... The party continues here, I hope you all are enjoying these sets I’m putting together for all of you. I’ve gotten some great feed back. As you can tell... I’m using my sets from my web show to post as my podcasts. If you want to see me do them live, check me out on www.radio4by4.com Monday mornings from 10 am till Noon EST. or 3 pm till 5 pm GMT.

item.title: Keep the weekend alive...
item.description:
Another show on www.radio4by4.com complete and I wanted to put it up as podcast for those that missed it. This journey is all about smoothness, we start a little funky then dive into Minimal... and somehow end up in a classic house session. I hope you all enjoy it. Please tell your friends about this podcast and have them download it!

Till next set...

item.title: Up Up and Away!!!
item.description:
So here is yet another 2 hour set.... maybe a little longer than that... I figure this should get you to work and back a couple of times. This was done live on Radio4by4.com on Monday May 9 on my show ‘The RedEyez Show’ Be sure to tune in every Monday from 10am till Noon EST.
Enjoy!!!

item.title: Planet X (special 2hr set)
item.description:
Ok... so here’s the deal... I was away last week and didn’t post a podcast... so to make up for it, I did a special 2 hour set!!! This was a live feed from my www.radio4by4.com show on Monday’s from 10am - noon EST. We get to hang around the Tech House side for a bit... then we to business!!! I hope you all enjoy all our sets. If you have any questions of comments please don’t hesitate to email me.
Please visit my website for email information.
www.ultimateimaging.ca

item.title: A day at Radio4by4.com
item.description:
So I’ve joined forces with another web-radio station called Radio4by4.com. They are based out of Sweden and I play Mondays from 10am-12pm EST. This is a great station all based on electronic music with DJ’s from all over the world. I love this station... nothing but good vibes. If you like House music, be sure to check my show and all the others.
www.radio4by4.com

item.title: Feeling The Funk
item.description:
Recently I joined a team of international DJ’s, together we are Asylum Radio Live. One of the DJ’s is based out of Edmonton, Alberta. His name is The Floorlayer, this cat if I can say... has got the “Funk”. This is a set he submitted for the Podcast... Seamless mixes that are sure to keep your feet moving and your head bobbing. I really do hope you enjoy this one.... If you would like more info on The Floorlayer please email me and I will set you up.
Remember to send us your demo’s and you could end up right here on one of our podcasts.

item.title: Trip to the Bubble Gum Shop...
item.description:
A young lady out of Hamilton wrote me last week and she requested a Top40’s set... and not too long ago I had said I was going to do one.... and here it is. A quick little trip to the Bubble Gum Shop.
Be sure to check out my live to air web show @ www.asylumradiolive.com for Madhouse Mondays 8pm-11pm EST each Monday for some mad hits and crazy vibes!!!!

See ya next week.

item.title: Liberation
item.description:
Welcome back, this week’s show is filled with dark deep sounds that are sure to keep you moving. I wanted to do something nice and dark, so I dug deep into the crates and came up with this.... I hope you all enjoy. If you have any comments or DJ sets you want me to listen to and possibly post please send me a link to your set along with a small bio to:
pietro@ultimateimaging.ca

ENJOY!!!

You can also catch me live on my webshow on Mondays at www.radio4by4.com from 10am EST till 12pm EST

item.title: Scrambled
item.description:
A listener out of London, England sent us in a great set that I’ve decided to post as this weeks Podcast. It is good, no it is great. I hope you all enjoy this as much as we did here in the studio. If you guys have a good tight set you would like the world to hear please do not hesitate to send me a copy, and maybe we will feature you set!!! Send all sets and or links to download them along with a small bio to my email address : pietro@ultimateimaging.ca
Hope you all enjoy this set and thank you Rich for sending this in, keep it up!!!

Till next week....


REDEYEZ

item.title: Let’s go Deeper!!!
item.description:
I was going to do a Top 40’s set, but due to the overwhelming positive response and requests, this show is a continuation of last weeks show. Big thanks to everyone that emailed us with all the great comments. If you like what you hear, then you should invite your friends to subscribe as well.

Track List to follow!!!

Big thanks to everyone that emailed us with all the great comments. If you like what you hear, then you should invite your friends to subscribe as well. Track List to follow!!!

item.title: Deeper / Harder
item.description:
This week’s show is a good one, one of our listeners from London, England suggested we go harder / deeper... and so I bring you this show based on deep house with some techno highlights.
So big shout out to Rich David for writing us and putting in your request. If you have any questions or requests or would like a shout out, do not hesitate to email us

TRACK LIST:

SOUL HEAVEN MY DIGITAL ENEMY
DERAILED TED NILSSON & STEVE HAINES
PARTY TIME EDSON PRIDE
MORE THAN JUST A FEELING BOURNE
DOT BOMB JOHN ACQUAVIVA & RAMON ZENKER
ROYAL T CROOKERS & ROISIN MURPHY
NO LIES YASS FEAT. LT. BROWN
ANNIHILATED DJ DAN
TECHNO LOGICAL WORLD TOCADISCO / KOEN GROENEVELD
OYE COMO VA CAPILARI VS. SALVAVIDA
ROOTS COPYRIGHT FEAT. JAZZIE B.
BASS TONE SOUL FUSSION
CANTINA BESTIAN VAN SHIELD VS. SPENCER HILL
I HATE HOUSE MUSIC DAVID TORT & JAVA
VERTIGO FEELING PAUL D LEWIS
THE JACK MOVE DEALERS OF FUNKY MUSIC

item.title: The Deep Spectrum of Trance
item.description:
Recorded on January 9th, this session was requested by a listener who loves Trance. We hope that all who love Trance take the time to listen to the jam. Once again, REDEYEZ has come through for his fans with this set. It will take you on a journey around the cosmos and bring you back again!

If you have any comments or requests please email us here at the show.

item.title: And so it begins...
item.description:
This is our first official podcast featuring DJ REDEYEZ, this is a 75 minute journey of pure musical bliss, slightly trancy with nothing but seamless mixes.

TRACK LIST:
DYNASTY SEVERAL SPIRITS
SEIZE THE DAY COSMIC GATE
INSIDE FDF
TIME LAPSE ENTOURAGE
ELEVEN SIX 2 SPECK
FEVER JONAS STEUR
PROGRESS COMPILATION
BROMANCE TIM BERG
BOM TEMPO SERGIO MENDES
ABOVE THE SKY AIRWAVE
ADAGIO 4 STRINGS FABIO ANDROMEDA
SUN SMILE BISKVIT
ONCE UPON A TIME EXUS & DARIOUS
ELECTRONIC SATISFACTION ENTOURAGE/AUDIOPHOX
SUGAR RUSH DJ HASHISH FT. MARCIE
SO ALONE STEVE KAETZEL FT. BRIANNA H.
ITRACK-LOOPEDE TIM BERG/OLIVER INGROSSO
& OTTO KNOWS
